cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-0038

description: The Linux kernel before 2.6.11 on the Itanium IA64 platform has certain "ptrace corner cases" that allow local users to cause a denial of service (crash) via crafted syscalls, possibly related to MCA/INIT, a different vulnerability than CVE-2005-1761.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-0136

description: The /proc handling (proc/base.c) Linux kernel 2.4 before 2.4.17 allows local users to cause a denial of service via unknown vectors that cause an invalid access of free memory.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-0489

description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: CVE-2003-0985.  Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2003-0985.  Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2003-0985 instead of this candidate.  All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

cvss2.cvss2_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-0528

description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Mac OS X kernel before 10.3.8 allows local users to cause a denial of service (temporary hang) via unspecified attack vectors related to the fan control unit (FCU) driver.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-0985

description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in the crttrap command in QNX Neutrino RTOS 6.2.1 allows local users to load arbitrary libraries via a LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable that references a malicious library.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-1528

description: The CoreGraphics Window Server in Mac OS X 10.4.1 allows local users with console access to gain privileges by "launching commands into root sessions."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-1726

description: Multiple vulnerabilities in the OpenSSL ASN.1 parser, as used in Novell iManager 2.0.2, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via crafted packets, as demonstrated by "OpenSSL ASN.1 brute forcer."  NOTE: this issue might overlap CVE-2004-0079, CVE-2004-0081, or CVE-2004-0112.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-1730

description: viewFile.php in the scm component of Gforge before 4.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the file_name parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-1752

description: ** DISPUTED **  ReadMessage.jsp in JavaMail API 1.1.3 through 1.3, as used by Apache Tomcat 5.0.16, allows remote attackers to view other users' e-mail attachments via a direct request to /mailboxesdir/username@domainname. NOTE: Sun and Apache dispute this issue.  Sun states: "The report makes references to source code and files that do not exist in the mentioned products."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-1753

description: ** DISPUTED **  JavaMail API 1.1.3 through 1.3, as used by Apache Tomcat 5.0.16, allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a full pathname in the argument to the Download parameter.  NOTE: Sun and Apache dispute this issue.  Sun states: "The report makes references to source code and files that do not exist in the mentioned products."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-1754

description: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in poll_vote.php in PHP Poll Creator 1.01 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via the relativer_pfad parameter.
